category.name: Product Structure.PSE Assembly
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: JT_File_Use_Monolithic_Icon
preference.preference_description: Defines whether a monolithic icon is displayed to indicate the presence of structure in a JT file in the BOM tree of the Structure Manager and Manufacturing Process Planner applications. Valid Values: * true: the monolithic icon is displayed when a monolithic JT file containing structure is loaded in the viewer. * false: the monolithic icon will still be displayed for nodes affected by the "JT_File_OverrideChildren_Refsets" preference.
